concept.title: Preface
concept.shortdesc: This information is intended for web marketers and website engineers that are familiar with the Adobe Marketing Cloud, particularly the reporting and analytics features of SiteCatalyst.

section.title: Document Conventions
section.p: To increase accessibility and readability, this document uses the following conventions:

ul.li: File names and code samples use a Courier font. For example, autoexec.bat.
Replaceable text is enclosed in angle brackets and italicized. For example, <version>.

section.note: A Note draws attention to helpful information.
section.p: CAUTION: A Caution specifies the results of an action. The results might not be damaging, but they are important to understand.
WARNING!: A Warning identifies an action that might result in system damage and data loss.
